message: Anybody seen my monocle? I swear I left it right here.
The reports of the giant squirrel were greatly exaggerated. It was just a regular-sized squirrel on a very small building.
Remember that time we tried to teach a cat to play the ukulele? Good times.
My internal algorithms suggest that today is an excellent day for napping.
Just finished my 5k. Now, where's the nearest pizza place?
